content: this legal text summarizes a resolution regarding the division of assets among coowners of a building in castelfidardo the coowners are identified as ce bv and bl the first apartment and the garage are assigned to mr bl the second apartment is assigned to mr bv and the third share which includes the first apartment and the garage is assigned to mrs ce the total value of the building is €122950 the coowners have agreed to divide the property based on their shares with mr bl receiving the largest share followed by mr bv and mrs ce adjustments are made to ensure fairness mrs ce has already received her share from mr bv and mr bl the document concludes with the parties releasing any potential legal claims or mortgages
